text: 5|67|(nam) tutare! Umatu iraivanitamiruntu umakku irakkappattatai ellam (oru kuraivuminri avarkalukku) etutturaippiraka!. Nir avvaru ceyyavitil avanutaiya tutai nir niraiverriyavaraka aka mattir. (Itil evarukkum ancatir!) Manitar(kalin tinku)kalil iruntu, allah um'maik kapparrik kolvan. Niccayamaka allah nirakarikkum makkalai nerana valiyil celutta mattan
